statements: SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges;
SELECT return_id, customer_id FROM Returns_and_Exchanges;
SELECT product_id, return_date FROM Returns_and_Exchanges;
SELECT customer_id, exchange_date FROM Returns_and_Exchanges;
SELECT return_reason, exchange_reason FROM Returns_and_Exchanges;
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE exchange_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE exchange_reason LIKE '%wrong color%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM Returns_and_Exchanges GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(exchange_date, return_date)) AS avg_exchange_duration FROM Returns_and_Exchanges;
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges ORDER BY exchange_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM Returns_and_Exchanges;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_returns FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_returns > 1;
SELECT return_id, customer_id, product_id, exchange_reason FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_id IN (1,2,3);
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_exchanges FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE exchange_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_exchanges > 0;
SELECT DISTINCT return_reason FROM Returns_and_Exchanges;
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, return_date FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT DISTINCT return_date FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE exchange_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, return_reason FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_reason LIKE '%defective%';
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT return_id, customer_id, product_id FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_date < '2022-05-15';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, exchange_reason FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE exchange_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, exchange_date FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE exchange_reason = 'Size mismatch';
SELECT return_id, exchange_date FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_reason IS NOT NULL AND exchange_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT customer_id, return_reason, exchange_reason FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_date < '2022-04-01' OR exchange_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE customer_id IN (100, 200, 300);
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_reason = 'Wrong color' AND exchange_reason = 'Size mismatch';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, return_date, exchange_date FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE return_date < exchange_date;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, return_id FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE DATEDIFF(exchange_date, return_date) > 7;
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE exchange_date = (SELECT MAX(exchange_date) FROM Returns_and_Exchanges);
SELECT return_id, customer_id, product_id FROM Returns_and_Exchanges WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM return_date) = 2022;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_returns FROM Returns_and_Exchanges GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(exchange_date, return_date)) AS avg_exchange_days FROM Returns_and_Exchanges GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(DATEDIFF(exchange_date, return_date)) AS max_exchange_days FROM Returns_and_Exchanges GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM returns;
SELECT return_id, return_date FROM returns;
SELECT return_id, customer_id, return_reason FROM returns;
SELECT * FROM exchanges;
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_date FROM exchanges;
SELECT customer_id, current_item_id, new_item_id FROM exchanges;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_date, exchange_reason FROM exchanges WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE item_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE current_item_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT return_id, customer_id FROM returns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT exchange_id, customer_id FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_reason LIKE '%size%';
SELECT AVG(item_id) FROM returns WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM exchanges WHERE customer_id = 8;
SELECT MAX(item_id) FROM returns;
SELECT MIN(current_item_id) FROM exchanges;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(return_id) FROM returns GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(exchange_id) FROM exchanges GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT return_id, customer_id, return_date, item_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT exchange_id, customer_id, exchange_date, current_item_id, new_item_id, exchange_reason FROM exchanges WHERE customer_id = 15;
SELECT return_id, customer_id, return_date, item_id FROM returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT exchange_id, customer_id, exchange_date, current_item_id FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT return_id, customer_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns WHERE customer_id = 20 AND return_reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT exchange_id, customer_id, exchange_date, exchange_reason FROM exchanges WHERE customer_id = 25 AND exchange_reason LIKE '%defective%';
SELECT return_reason, COUNT(return_id) FROM returns GROUP BY return_reason ORDER BY COUNT(re...
SELECT * FROM returns;
SELECT return_id, order_id, return_date FROM returns;
SELECT order_id, return_date FROM returns WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM exchanges;
SELECT exchange_id, order_id, exchange_date, exchange_reason FROM exchanges;
SELECT order_id, exchange_date FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM returns JOIN products ON returns.order_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM exchanges JOIN products ON exchanges.order_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_reason LIKE '%defective%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM returns;
SELECT AVG(product_price) FROM products;
SELECT product_category, AVG(product_price) FROM products GROUP BY product_category;
SELECT product_category, COUNT(*) FROM products GROUP BY product_category;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT MAX(product_price) FROM products;
SELECT * FROM returns INNER JOIN orders ON returns.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE returns.return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT exchange_date, exchange_reason FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_reason LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY exchange_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 AND product_category = 'Clothing';
SELECT MAX(product_price) AS max_price FROM products;
SELECT AVG(product_price) AS avg_price, product_category FROM products GROUP BY product_category;
SELECT product_name, product_price, exchange_date, exchange_reason FROM products INNER JOIN exchanges ON products.product_id = exchanges.order_id;
SELECT return_id, count(order_id) AS total_orders FROM returns GROUP BY return_id HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT return_id, products.product_name AS returned_product FROM returns INNER JOIN products ON returns.order_id = products.product_id;
SELECT AVG(product_price) AS avg_price, product_category FROM products GROUP BY product_category HAVING avg_price > 50;
SELECT product_category, COUNT(*) AS total_exchanges FROM exchanges GROUP BY product_category;
SELECT exchange_id, product_name, product_price FROM exchanges INNER JOIN products ON exchanges.order_id = products.product_id WHERE exchange_reason = 'Wrong size';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_returns FROM returns;
SELECT exchange_id, product_name, product_price FROM exchanges INNER JOIN products ON exchanges.order_id = products.product_id WHERE exchange_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT product_name, SUM(product_price) AS total_price FROM products GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT exchange_id, products.product_name, exchange_date FROM exchanges INNER JOIN products ON exchanges.order_id = products.product_id ORDER BY exchange_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT return_id, return_date, exchange_reason FROM returns LEFT JOIN exchanges ON returns.return_id = exchanges.exchange_id WHERE exchange_reason IS NULL;
SELECT product_category, AVG(product_price) AS avg_price, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY product_category HAVING total_products > 5;
SELECT return_id, exchanges.exchange_id, return_date FROM returns RIGHT JOIN exchanges ON returns.return_id = exchanges.exchange_id;
SELECT product_category, SUM(product_price) AS total_price FROM products GROUP BY product_category HAVING total_price > 500;
SELECT * FROM Returns;
SELECT return_id, customer_id, return_date FROM Returns;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM Returns;
SELECT * FROM Exchanges;
SELECT exchange_id, customer_id, exchange_date FROM Exchanges;
SELECT original_product_id, new_product_id FROM Exchanges;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM Products;
SELECT price FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM Returns WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Returns WHERE return_reason = 'Defective');
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Returns WHERE return_reason = 'Changed Mind' AND product_id = 5);
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT return_id, return_date, product_id FROM Returns WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01' AND return_reason LIKE '%defective%';
SELECT e.exchange_id, e.exchange_date, p.product_name FROM Exchanges e JOIN Products p ON e.original_product_id = p.product_id WHERE e.customer_id = 2;
SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, p.product_name, p.price FROM Customers c JOIN Products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id;
SELECT r.return_id, r.return_date, p.product_name, p.category FROM Returns r JOIN Products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.category = 'electronics';
SELECT c.customer_name, c.phone_number, p.product_name, p.price FROM Customers c JOIN Products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id AND p.category = 'clothing';

SELECT e.exchange_id, e.exchange_date, p1.product_name AS original_product, p2.product_name AS new_product FROM Exchanges e JOIN Products p1 ON e.original_product_id = p1.product_id JOIN Products p2 ON e.new_product_id = p2.product_id;

SELECT r.return_id, c.customer_name, r.return_date, p.product_name, p.price FROM Returns r JOIN Customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN Products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM Customers c JOIN Products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT r.return_id, r.return_date, p.product_name, p.price FROM Returns r JOIN Products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.return_reason IN ('damaged', 'expired');
SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name FROM Customers c JOIN Returns r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(r.return_id) AS total_returns FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Returns r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING total_returns > 3;
SELECT c.customer_name, AVG(p.price) AS avg_product_price FROM Customers c JOIN Returns r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN Products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(p.price) AS total_spent FROM Customers c JOIN Exchanges e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id JOIN Products p ON e.original_product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM Customers c JOIN Products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id WHERE p.price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM Customers c JOIN Products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id AND p.category = 'electronics' ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM Products;
SELECT c.customer_name, MAX(p.price) AS most_expensive_product FROM Customers c JOIN Products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM Customers c JOIN Products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_name LIKE '%iphone%' OR p.product_name LIKE '%Samsung%';

SELECT r.return_id, r.return_date, c.customer_name, e1.product_name AS original_product, e2.product_name AS new_product FROM Returns r JOIN Customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN Exchanges e1 ON r.product_id = e1.product_id JOIN Exchanges e2 ON r.product_id = e2.product_id WHERE r.return_reason = 'defective';
SELECT * FROM Returns;
SELECT customer_id, return_date FROM Returns;
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM Returns;
SELECT * FROM Exchanges;
SELECT customer_id, exchange_reason FROM Exchanges;
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_date FROM Exchanges;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM ProductInventory;
SELECT quantity_in_stock, price FROM ProductInventory;
SELECT * FROM SaleRecords;
SELECT customer_id, sale_date FROM SaleRecords;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity_sold FROM SaleRecords;
SELECT product_id, price FROM ProductInventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, exchange_date FROM Exchanges WHERE exchange_reason = 'Defective Product';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-15';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM ProductInventory WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, sale_date, total_price FROM SaleRecords WHERE total_price > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM Returns JOIN SaleRecords ON Returns.customer_id = SaleRecords.customer_id
SELECT SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM SaleRecords
SELECT product_name, price, quantity_in_stock FROM ProductInventory WHERE price > 50
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(sale_id) AS total_sales FROM SaleRecords GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 2
SELECT * FROM Exchanges JOIN CustomerFeedback ON Exchanges.customer_id = CustomerFeedback.customer_id
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM ProductInventory
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, MIN(total_price) AS min_price FROM SaleRecords GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT product_id, MAX(quantity_sold) AS max_quantity_sold FROM SaleRecords GROUP BY product_id
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_date, exchange_reason FROM Exchanges WHERE exchange_reason LIKE '%defective%'
SELECT return_id, customer_id, return_date FROM Returns WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT product_name, price, quantity_in_stock FROM ProductInventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_price) AS avg_total_price FROM SaleRecords GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM SaleRecords)
SELECT * FROM Returns JOIN SaleRecords USING (customer_id)
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM SaleRecords
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products_sold FROM SaleRecords GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 100
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price_per_product FROM ProductInventory
SELECT SUM(total_price) AS total_revenue FROM SaleRecords
SELECT customer_id, MIN(sale_date) AS first_sale_date FROM SaleRecords GROUP BY customer_id
